languages.text: Это почтенное оружие принадлежало набожной проповеднице Петракаре, несшей свет в Ночные сатрапии темного мира Обскуралион.
This venerable weapon belonged to the devout preacher Petrakara, who brought light to the Night Satrapies of the dark world of Obscuralion.
languages.original_text: Это почтенное оружие принадлежало набожной проповеднице Петракаре, несшей свет в Ночные сатрапии темного мира Обскуралион.

traits.locale_text: This venerable weapon belonged to the devout preacher Petrakara, who brought light to the Night Satrapies of the dark world of Obscuralion.
This venerable weapon belonged to the devout preacher Petrakara, who brought light to the Night Satrapies of the dark world of Obscuralion.
This venerable weapon belonged to the devout preacher Petrakara, who brought light to the Night Satrapies of the dark world of Obscuralion.
This venerable weapon belonged to the devout preacher Petrakara, who brought light to the Night Satrapies of the dark world of Obscuralion.
This venerable weapon belonged to the devout preacher Petrakara, who brought light to the Night Satrapies of the dark world of Obscuralion.

languages.text: 这件受人敬畏的武器曾属于虔诚的布道士佩特卡拉，他为黑暗世界奥布斯塔利恩带来了光明。
languages.original_text: This venerable weapon belonged to the devout preacher Petrakara, who brought light to the Night Satrapies of the dark world of Obscuralion.

traits.locale_text: 这件受人敬畏的武器曾属于虔诚的布道士佩特卡拉，他为黑暗世界奥布斯塔利恩带来了光明。

languages.text: この由緒ある武器は、暗黒世界オブスキュラリオンのナイト・サトラパティに光をもたらした敬虔なプリーチャー・ペトラカラのものだった。
languages.original_text: This venerable weapon belonged to the devout preacher Petrakara, who brought light to the Night Satrapies of the dark world of Obscuralion.

traits.locale_text: この由緒ある武器は、暗黒世界オブスキュラリオンのナイト・サトラパティに光をもたらした敬虔なプリーチャー・ペトラカラのものだった。

languages.text: Esta venerable arma perteneció a la devota predicadora Petrakara, que trajo la luz a las Satrapías Nocturnas del mundo oscuro de Obscuralion.
languages.original_text: This venerable weapon belonged to the devout preacher Petrakara, who brought light to the Night Satrapies of the dark world of Obscuralion.

traits.locale_text: Esta venerable arma perteneció a la devota predicadora Petrakara, que trajo la luz a las Satrapías Nocturnas del mundo oscuro de Obscuralion.

languages.text: Cette arme vénérable appartenait au prêcheur dévot Petrakara qui apporta la lumière aux Satrapes nocturnes sur le monde ténébreux d'Obscuralion.
languages.original_text: This venerable weapon belonged to the devout preacher Petrakara, who brought light to the Night Satrapies of the dark world of Obscuralion.

traits.locale_text: Cette arme vénérable appartenait au prêcheur dévot Petrakara qui apporta la lumière aux Satrapes nocturnes sur le monde ténébreux d'Obscuralion.

languages.text: Diese ehrwürdige Waffe gehörte der frommen Predigerin Petrakara, die den Nacht-Satrapien der dunklen Welt Obscuralion das Licht brachte.
languages.original_text: This venerable weapon belonged to the devout preacher Petrakara, who brought light to the Night Satrapies of the dark world of Obscuralion.

traits.locale_text: Diese ehrwürdige Waffe gehörte der frommen Predigerin Petrakara, die den Nacht-Satrapien der dunklen Welt Obscuralion das Licht brachte.
